HOW IT WORKS:

1. Set up your personalized connection request and message sequence - according to your custom schedule and rules.

2. Choose your target audience from standard LinkedIn search / LinkedIn Sales Navigator / your LinkedIn network or import them from your CSV file.

3. Press ‚ÄúStart‚Äù and watch getting replies!

Pro tip: InTouch Tool extracts emails and other personal data of your prospects, so you can reach them using other channels. Export LinkedIn profiles into your CRM or a CSV file.

Check out our website for demo videos and other information: https://intouchtool.com/


SAFETY:

ü§ñ Safety is #1 focus of InTouch Tool - it is designed for 100% simulation of human activity and can‚Äôt be detected by LinkedIn.

InTouch Tool clicks buttons on LinkedIn website in the same way as you do - unlike the cloud-based automation solutions, that put your LinkedIn account at risk.

Every action is scheduled using our smart AI-based algorithms and performed in your own browser which makes LinkedIn automation indistinguishable from manual activity.
